Text:
The color is pretty washed out, the sound is echo-y and the angle is off a bit.  I'm only through 10 minutes and already wanting to turn this off.

Video - 6/10
Audio - 4/10

The quality is fine but, wait, oh shit!! They forgot the subtitles! And, since this movie is set in the Middle East, there's a lot of Arabic (or something--whatever it is, i don't speak it and neither do you). Thus, this rip is crap.
